subject: Re: We offer loans for business
body:
Good Day.


Thanks for your response

We kindly want you to know that Loan is given at a 3% interest rate. The
minimum loan we offer is $5,000 why the maximum loan amount is
$10,000,000.00. It's also given in Pounds, Euro and Rand. Once the loan funds
are approved the loan will be deposited in your bank account within 24
hours with no further delay.

In order to proceed with the loan application kindly fill the loan
application form and get back to us as soon as possible.


*LOAN APPLICATION FORM { ONLINE FORM }*


PERSONAL INFORMATION

First Name: .............................
Last Name: ..............................
Contact Address: . ......................
City/Zip Code: ..........................
State....................................
country..................................
Gender: .................................
Date of birth (yyyy-mm-dd): .............

LOAN INFORMATION

Amount Needed: ..........................
Duration:................................
Telephone: ..............................
Fax .....................................
Name Of Company: ........................
Occupation: .............................
Monthly Income:..............


Looking forward to your e-mail.

Mr Larry James.
